means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 斯皮特尔职业名称，公寓的雇员，来源于中世纪英语及拉丁语，含义是“客人”(guest)

sentence.Network_cn: 唾液顺着他的下巴流下来。

sentence.Network_en: Gobs of grease / spittle ran down his chin.
sentence.Network_cn: 一滴滴的油[口水]顺着他的下巴流下.

sentence.Network_en: Maybe it was all that spittle that turned me off the cake.
sentence.Network_cn: 也许是那些口水让我对蛋糕倒胃口.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: alteration of dialect spattle, by association with spit

entry.def: Spittle is the watery liquid which is produced in your mouth.

example.tran: 唾液顺着他的下巴流下来。

means.word_mean: 1. a clear liquid secreted into the mouth by the salivary glands and mucous glands of the mouth; moistens the mouth and starts the digestion of starches
